title: [Bad] Tinder is not liable even if they know of the possibility of damages.

tosdr.tldr: IN NO EVENT WILL Tinder BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY  DAMAGES and SERVICE INTERRUPTIONS, EVEN IF THE COMPANY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
